7302a732dc598907790f407417551c2b13e89daa57b3698489ef5484b","dweb:/ipfs/QmdX5qmk3VSniSErFuD4aVawQxUi2MuUbP7spPcHddPfcX"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc6a8ff0ea489379b61faa647490411b80102578440ab9d84e9a957cc12164e70","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://0ea104e577e63faea3b69c415637e99e755dcbf64c5833d7140c35a714d6d90c","dweb:/ipfs/Qmau6x4Ns9XdyynRCNNp3RhLqijJjFm7z5fyZazfYFGYdq"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC20/extensions/IERC20Permit.sol":{"keccak256":"0x6008dabfe393240d73d7dd7688033f72740d570aa422254d29a7dce8568f3aff","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f5196ec75139918c6c7bb4251b36395e668f1fa6d206beba7e7520e74913940d","dweb:/ipfs/QmSyqjksXxmm2mCG6qRd1yuwLykypkSVBbnBnGqJRcuJMi"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC20/utils/SafeERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0x37bb49513c49c87c4642a891b13b63571bc87013dde806617aa1efb54605f386","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b3036b3a83b7c48f96641f2a9002b9f2dcb6a5958dd670894ada21ae8229b3d0","dweb:/ipfs/QmUNfSBdoVtjhETaUJCYcaC7pTMgbhht926tJ2uXJbiVd3"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Address.sol":{"keccak256":"0xaf28a975a78550e45f65e559a3ad6a5ad43b9b8a37366999abd1b7084eb70721","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://b7bd24e224f67f65bfadf85dc2929fa965456bb2415478bd0125471b5ce35245","dweb:/ipfs/QmRaydGr8BTHs1kvaZfsNU69pKzUAGFrvABn1KiRSbE51y"]}},"version":1}

enterAsLong(address).details: Allows the second party to take the opposing side (long or short) and activate the contract.

params.realLong: The address of the user taking the long side (if maker was short, this will be msg.sender).

exercise(uint256,address).details: Exercises the contract after resolution, calculating payout based on the sinusoidal payoff curve.      Can only be called by the GenieBook, which passes in the long's address for authorization. param _unused Placeholder (not used, premium always 0 for futures)

params.realLong: The address of the long position (for verification)

fund(uint256,uint256).details: Funds the contract with the strike notional (if maker is long) or underlying (if maker is short), and locks in the strike price.

params.expirySeconds: Relative number of seconds until expiry.
params.strikeNotional: The amount of strike token funding provided (if maker is long). Must correspond to desired strike price.

getOracleAddress().details: Returns the oracle address used by this contract.

initialize(address,address,address,strin.details: Initializes the SinusoidalGenie contract clone. This should be called via the GenieBook.

params._positionSize: Quantity of underlying (1e18 units) for the contract
params._premiumMustBeZero: Must be 0 (no premium for these contracts)
params._short: The address of the maker (initial short position holder, or long if makerIsLongFlag is true)
params._sideFlag: If 1, the maker is taking the long side; if 0, maker is short
params._strikeSymbol: Symbol or identifier of the strike asset
params._strikeToken: Address of the ERC20 strike asset token (payout currency)
params._underlyingSymbol: Symbol or identifier of the underlying asset
params._underlyingToken: Address of the ERC20 underlying asset token

reclaim(address).details: Allows the short side to reclaim their funds if the contract expires without exercise (no payout).

params.realShort: The address of the short position (for verification)

resolve().details: Resolve fetches the price at expiry from the oracle (callable by anyone after expiry).

setSinusoidalOffset(int256).details: Sets a phase offset (in radians, 1e18-scaled) applied to the sinusoidal angle.      Can be called before funding/activation by the GenieBook.

setSinusoidalParameters(uint256,uint256).details: Sets the sinusoidal payoff parameters (amplitude and period) before funding.

params._amplitude1e18: Amplitude as a fraction of notional (scaled 1e18, >0 up to 1e18)
params._period1e18: Period of the sinusoidal payoff curve in price difference units (scaled 1e18)
